newsitem.title: UK: GILTS END WITH ONLY MODEST GAINS DESPITE EU DEAL.
newsitem.headline: GILTS END WITH ONLY MODEST GAINS DESPITE EU DEAL.

text.p: Gilts ended with moderate gains on Monday, clearing key resistance along the way, but dealers said they doubted the market had much further to rally.
The September gilt future settled 9/32 higher at 114-13, having broken resistance at 114-08,10 -- an area which had thwarted the contract for the previous 10 days, technical analysts said.

But dealers were sceptical. "I hear what the chartists are saying but I doubt the market will rally too far from here," a senior gilts salesman said. "I don't think we are much more than a half-point away from the top of this move."
